text: @realDonaldTrump Dems "may" be killing businesses, but YOU are killing PEOPLE. Stop bullshit & do what's needed to limit COVID-19 damage: ability to test/trace/isolate + more PPE & ventilators. Yes, it's the federal government's job, & if you don't agree, then turn over fed tax money to states.
